name: Blood Harvest (itch) (SmelJey, August Florén, MaxHamlet)
description:
A game about harvesting blood from people! Play as a vampire, strike from the shadows and drink your prey's blood.

Drink as much blood as you can and get to the exit safe, without being caught by guards

Controls:

- WASD - movement

- QE - rotate camera

- Space - attack

- Left Shift - run (makes a lot of noise)

- Left Ctrl or C - crouch (to move silently)

Exit will be available when you finish level goal

Credits:

- SmelJey - programming

- paconedved - programming

- Owlmoss - 3d models

- Augie - concept art and textures

- MaxHamlet - music and sfx
